jobAction.name: Interception
jobAction.description: [Slash][Agility] A counterattack that deals slashing damage. While active, damage from blockable attacks is nullified and will trigger a counterattack. Effect ends after a period of time, or after triggering once.

50.description: Increases break gauge recovery speed by 7.5% when a shield is equipped.

120.name: Shield Bonus II
